c74object.name: sy.slice
c74object.description: Splits the incoming symbol into two, according to a split point.

objarg.name: index
objarg.description: Sets the initial split point (see index attribute).

method.name: anything
method.description: Splits the incoming symbol according to the split point (see index attribute). Outputs the right part from the right outlet, and the left part from the left outlet.

method.name: bang
method.description: Splits the most recently received input symbol.

attribute.name: index
attribute.description: Sets the index of the split point, that is the position of the first element of the second part of the symbol. If a negative position is set, it is counted from the end of the symbol.

attribute.name: listin
listout
maxdecimals
attribute.digest: Maximum Decimal Digits For Number Conversion
attribute.description: Sets the maximum number of decimals to be used for the conversion from number to symbol, in case the numbers attribute is set to "Convert To Symbol".

attribute.name: label
attribute.value: Maximum Decimal Digits For Number Conversion

attribute.name: numin
numout
